tool_description: Search the Australian PPSR register and generate a PDF certificate.  Allow searching by the car's VIN or registration.
name: PPSR Search Certificate - Motor Vehicle
title: PPSR Search Certificate - Motor Vehicle

api_list.name: PPSR Lookup by VIN
api_list.description: Lookup a PPSR by a vehicle's VIN and retrieve the search results and a PDF URL.

api_list.name: Check Valid VIN
api_list.description: Confirm that the VIN is a currently registered vehicle.  Returns the vehicle's details.

api_list.name: PPSR Lookup by Registration
api_list.description: Lookup a PPSR by a vehicle's registration and retrieve the search results and a PDF URL.  Simple send the vehicle's number plate and state abbreviation.

api_list.name: Check Valid Registration
api_list.description: Confirm that the registration and state is a currently registered vehicle.  Returns the vehicle's details.
